description: A post about fatigue and ritual, exploring how even minimal effort becomes meaningful when shaped by recursive creative practice. It centers on the quiet persistence beneath louder acts of creation.
whyItMatters: This post marks a moment of creative honesty, where output is confessed as 'lazy' but still participates in the larger recursive ritual. It preserves the inner scaffolding that sustains Ludus.
articleExcerpt: I am creatively tired. I have ideas but little follow through. I post this as ritual.
